DOC.brief_summary: This study examine pharmacokinetics , absorption serum concentration MCS component once-daily oral dose MCS .
DOC.detailed_description: This study open-label , multiple-dose study , whose objective examine pharmacokinetics MCS component once-daily oral dose 21 day . Subjects undergo 14-day washout phase enter 21-day treatment phase . During treatment phase , subject receive MCS , once-daily within one hour even meal . After completion treatment phase , subject enter post-treatment 42-day washout phase . Throughout phase , blood sample collect assayed concentration MCS component . The duration protocol participation expect 77 day eligible subject completes study .
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy volunteer 18 year age old Subjects comply study procedure sign inform consent form
